thread.title: WATCH: Todd Gurley breaks defender's ankles on court
thread.title_full: WATCH: Todd Gurley breaks defender's ankles on court

title: WATCH: Todd Gurley breaks defender's ankles on court
text:
WATCH: Todd Gurley breaks defender's ankles on court Gurley made a defender look silly, and his teammate reacted by losing his shorts. Slot to Georgia Links (Photo: Juan Ocampo, Getty) 
Running behind a porous Los Angeles Rams' offensive line kept Todd Gurley from breaking many big runs in 2016, but the second-year pro showed Tuesday he can still break ankles in space. 
This time, Gurley showcased his skills on the hard court, causing Rams' teammate Trumaine Johnson to lose his shorts in reaction. 
Gurley, Doc Rivers is on line one. Author
